name: Eletronics Super Shop
description:
Electronic Super Shop is the only shop in the block that can get you updated on your old memories. Bring your VHS, MiniDiscs, Hi8 or MiniDV tapes, and we'll find a way to plug that out to any thing you want!

The player takes the role of a electronics shop who receives requests from clients, to plug old content into various devices. Using a connection system, the player must find a viable way to transmit data from the source to the receiving end.

This game was developed for Ludum Dare 36.

Art by Marco Vale and Débora Almeida. Code by me.
